name: Limerol
description: A summertime drink with watermelon and Aperol, bittersweet and fruity.
directions: Clean the lime with hot water, dry and cut it into bits, then throw them into a long glass. Add sugar and mix well with the lemon juice.
Remove the watermelon pulp and cut it into cubes. Pour it into a blender with the Aperol and mix.
Fill the glass with 1/3 picked ice. Add the watermelon mix and stir well. Add the cava and serve with a straw.
